entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
